name: Wanderlust (itch) (Gabriel Brasil)
description:
Mark is an astronaut that in his first mission got lost in space. Now it's your duty to help him survive until the rescue arrives. You have to escape the aliens, avoid the asteroids and pick up all the oxygen capsules in order to survive.

Use the left/right arrows to rotate and the up arrow to accelerate.

For a while, the high score is just local.

You can check the game's source code in this Github repository.

developed with Phaser.io.
